Content: Four persons including a woman were injured in a hand grenade attack which was carried out targeting a house in Bohingamuwa, Kuliyapitiya. The attack was carried out at around 9.45 pm yesterday (Jul 01) and the injured were admitted to Kuliyapitiya Hospital. The attacker has been identified. Police said that the suspect had attended a wedding ceremony last night and he had involved in a clash with another group there. Thereafter, he had thrown a hand grenade at a house. The suspect has fled the area following the incident.
